channel.title: section on Mon test Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in section on Mon test Hugo

item.title: Article 1
item.description: First article. This will land in content/articles/ as the parent of this subtree sets EXPORT_HUGO_SECTION to articles. Note that the theme needs to define at least the single.html, either in the layouts/_default/ directory, or layouts/articles/, either in the Hugo base dir or the theme dir.
